House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of Congress that the air traffic controllers should immediately end their strike by returning to work while continuing their negotiations with the Secretary of Transportation.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the air traffic controllers should end their strike and return to work while continuing negotiations with the Secretary of Transportation to resolve their collective bargaining dispute.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of Congress that the air traffic controllers should immediately end their strike by returning to work while continuing their negotiations with the Secretary of Transportation.
